occupation: Senior Partner Manager: National Accounting Firms at Intuit
headline: Harnessing strengths to accelerate growth: People, Process & Technology
summary: Results oriented, highly dedicated leader with record of achievement. Creatively designs and implements strategic business plans. Excels at building consensus among executive teams and stakeholders, promoting transparency, influencing positive change and driving outcomes. Extensive experience with partner marketing and vertical brand integration to deliver innovative customer solutions.

experiences.title: Senior Partner Manager: National Accounting Firms
experiences.description: Responsible for identifying Fintech opportunities across National Accounting Firms and establishing the relationships needed to bring those opportunities to life. Focus on sales, revenue, delivery, and client satisfaction. Create, own, and maintain the plan.

experiences.title: Director
experiences.description:
Small business understanding.  
•	Built start-up company from the ground up, responsible for business operations, financial oversight and marketing. The apps for automation, workflow and productivity
•	Led the teams to ensure value to the customer driving everyone’s success.  Managed $5M in contract work, generating six-figures in revenue in our first year

experiences.title: Regional Channel Partner Manager
experiences.description:
Developed and executed Canadian channel partner strategy to support high-volume financial institutions and accountants. 
•	Provided leadership and cross-organization integration to the sales team, collaborated with various departments, proposed solutions and supported achievement of business results.

experiences.title: Partner Business Development Manager
experiences.description:
Produced and delivered business plans for enterprise channel partners in Western Canada for national and global based partners. Aligned business strategy, objectives and direction. Focus on sales, revenue, delivery, and client satisfaction. 
•	Led sales team’s collaboration, identifying opportunities in enterprise, corporate and public-sector accounts and implemented actions, encouraging partners to grow sales.

experiences.title: Western Territory Account Executive
experiences.description:
Spearheaded Customer Driven Innovation of the education vertical during a time of rapid change; implementing mobile technology in the classroom. Solved complex problems.  
•	Led teams including sales, partner managers, marketing, product teams & technical leads. Collaborated to design goals and strategic market initiatives
•	Grew business 25%, secured #1 market position, Ranked in the top 1% of worldwide sales

experiences.title: Western Territory Account Manager, Commercial Solutions

accomplishment_honors_awards.description: Awarded Top Talent in Q1 by my colleagues for national partner strategy implementation

accomplishment_honors_awards.title: 2013 Growth Partner of the Year
accomplishment_honors_awards.description: Mobility strategy helped Long View win 2013 HP Canadian Growth Partner of the Year

recommendations:
Andrew Bentley

      
          
          



              
                
        
              
  

      
          Sue is one of the most collaborative people I have had the pleasure to work with in my career. She is incredibly creative and has a great energy. I would recommend Sue for any organization that needs, creativity, professionalism and passion.

Glenna Poch

      
          
          



              
                
        
              
  

      
          Sue’s enthusiasm and drive for results is infectious with those around her.  With a keen interest in people and success, Sue has the ability to strategically evaluate a situation, bring all stakeholders together resulting in successful outcomes.  Sue has a strength in quickly evaluating market conditions and aligning solutions that drive business results.  She takes that solution, develops a marketing plan that brings strategy into tactical steps.  Her strong people skills allows her to engage the extended team members to successfully execute meeting the goals of each participant.  Sue is a leader that brings out the best in people, ensuring there is fun and success in all she works on.
